system.description:
Beginning at 3rd level, you develop uncanny skill in knowing what to look forâ€”and where to look for it. You gain the following benefits:

  • The Search action takes a bonus action for you, rather than an action. 

  • You gain proficiency with Perception. If you are already proficient with Perception, you instead gain an expertise die with it.  Your maximum expertise die size for Perception is 1d12. 

  • Your Passive Perception score increases by 5.

  • You can read lips. If you can see the mouth of a creature that is speaking a language you know, you can understand what it is saying even if you cannot hear it.

  • You gain an expertise die on Initiative checks.
